transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Anand ji baat kar rahe ho sir?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Namaskar sir, mai Adarsh baat kar raha hu. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Kaha se?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART head office se.
Aapki company hai na Galaxy computer karke.
Customer: Ek minute baat kar raha hu bhaiya.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir aapne kal call kiya tha 5 tarikh ko tender ke regarding information ke liye.
Customer: Yes sir yes sir maine call kiya tha aapko.
Executive: Wo ho gaya sir?
Customer: Nahi sir wo show nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: To ek bar aap meeting me aa jao.
Ek bar mail open kar lijiye sir aap.
Customer: Ha, mai mail open kar raha hu sir, ek second. Invitation gaya hoga aapko Adarsh.jaiswal.indiamart ke name se.
Customer: Registered mail pe na sir?
Executive: Ha, mai kis pe gaya mai bata de raha hu.
Ha aa gayi sir aapki invitation aa gayi sir ispe. Open karke join kar lijiye.
Customer: Ek second sir.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says tender is not showing.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to join meeting.
- Executive asked customer to open mail.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, meeting, invitation
